contentrichtext.text: {{italic title}} {{Taxobox | name = Xanthia togata | image = Xanthia togata FvL.jpg | image_width = | image_caption = | image2 = Xanthia togata.jpg | regnum = [[Animal]]ia | phylum = [[Arthropod]]a | subphylum = [[Hexapoda]] | classis = [[Insect]]a | ordo = [[Lepidoptera]] | familia = [[Noctuidae]] | tribus = | genus = [[Xanthia]] | species = '''''X. togata''''' | binomial = ''Xanthia togata'' | binomial_authority = [[Eugen Johann Christoph Esper|Esper]], 1788 | synonyms = }} The '''Pink-barred Sallow''' ''(Xanthia togata)'' is a species of [[moth]] of the family [[Noctuidae]]. It is found in [[Europe]]. The [[wingspan]] is 27–30 mm. The length of the forewings is 13–16 mm. The moth flies from August to October depending on the location. The larvae feed on [[Willow]] and [[Poplar]], but in a later stage also various herbaceous plants.<ref>{{cite web|url= http://www.nhm.ac.uk/research-curation/research/projects/hostplants/ |title= Robinson, G. S., P. R. Ackery, I. J. Kitching, G. W. Beccaloni & L. M. Hernández, 2010. HOSTS - A Database of the World's Lepidopteran Hostplants. Natural History Museum, London.}}</ref> ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== *[http://www.lepiforum.de/cgi-bin/lepiwiki.pl?Xanthia_Togata Lepiforum] *[http://www.nic.funet.fi/pub/sci/bio/life/insecta/lepidoptera/ditrysia/noctuoidea/noctuidae/xyleninae/xanthia/index.html Funet] Taxonomy *[http://www.faunaeur.org Fauna Europaea] *[http://www.vlindernet.nl/?soortcode=XANTTOGA Vlindernet {{nl}}] *[http://waarneming.nl/soort.php?id=1959 waarneming.nl {{nl}}] *[http://webh01.ua.ac.be/vve/Checklists/Lepidoptera/Noctuidae/Xtogata.htm Lepidoptera of Belgium] *[http://ukmoths.org.uk/show.php?id=206 Pink-barred Sallow at UKmoths] {{commons|Xanthia togata}} [[Category:Cuculliinae]] {{Cuculliinae-stub}}
